Buraq Al Taybah Engineering & Technical Services L.L.C is a Dubai-based engineering contractor specializing in precision-driven technical services.

Company Name: Buraq Al Taybah Engineering & Technical Services L.L.C
Arabic Name: براق الطيبة للخدمات الفنية والهندسية ذ.م.م
Tagline: The Measure of Technical Excellence

Services:
- Interior Fit-Out, MEP & Technical Services (Electrical, HVAC, Plumbing, Fire Fighting, Testing & Commissioning, AMC)
- Electromechanical & Automation Systems (BMS, GRMS/GRMG Hotel Room Automation, PLC Control Systems, Energy Management)
- Commercial Kitchen Equipment Services (Installation, Exhaust & Hood Systems, Gas Systems, Preventive Maintenance, AMC)
- Civil & Interior Fit-Out Works (Partitioning, Ceiling, Painting, Tiling, Turnkey Renovation)
- Facility Management & AMC (Scheduled Inspections, Emergency Breakdown Response, Annual Maintenance Contracts)
- Carpentry, Aluminum & Glass Works (Furniture Fabrication, Aluminum Frames, Glass Panels & Partitions)
- Swimming Pool Services (Pool Cleaning, Water Treatment, Filtration Systems, Repairs, AMC)

Sectors Served:
- Residential (Villas, Apartments)
- Commercial (Offices, Retail)
- Hospitality (Hotels, Resorts, Restaurants)
- Industrial (Warehouses, Factories)

Location: Dubai, UAE
Phone: +971503942123
Email: info@buraqaltaybah.com
Website: https://www.buraqaltaybah.com

Vision: To become a trusted premium engineering brand in the UAE, recognized for technical excellence, reliability, and superior project delivery.

Mission:
- Deliver quality-driven MEP and BMS solutions
- Maintain strict technical and safety standards
- Build long-term client relationships through trust and consistent performance

Core Values: Precision, Accountability, Reliability, Technical Excellence

Working Hours: Monday–Saturday, 8:00 AM – 6:00 PM
